wordsList.0:
{
    "entry": "Voila qui est etrange ! s'etonna la vieille dame Qu'as-tu vu d'autre dans ton reve ? Tom fit mine de reflechir : Hum... voyons... tu parlais d'une porte qui venait de s'ouvrir. Si est alle la fermer. Et puis, tu disais que je n'etais pas mechant, et meme que j'avais un coeur d'or",
    "fromlan": "French",
    "lanto": "English",
    "tolan": "",
    "trans": "This is strange! If etonna the old lady that you saw on the other in your dream? Tom pretended to think: UM... Let's see... you were talking to a door that had opened. If it is close it all. And then you said that I was not nasty, and even I had a heart of gold"
}
wordsList.1:
{
    "entry": "C'est facile, chuchota Tom.",
    "fromlan": "French",
    "lanto": "English",
    "tolan": "",
    "trans": "It of easy, whispered Tom."
}

trans: This is strange! If etonna the old lady that you saw on the other in your dream? Tom pretended to think: UM... Let's see... you were talking to a door that had opened. If it is close it all. And then you said that I was not nasty, and even I had a heart of gold
entry: Voila qui est etrange ! s'etonna la vieille dame Qu'as-tu vu d'autre dans ton reve ? Tom fit mine de reflechir : Hum... voyons... tu parlais d'une porte qui venait de s'ouvrir. Si est alle la fermer. Et puis, tu disais que je n'etais pas mechant, et meme que j'avais un coeur d'or
